resources.string:
We have tried to make the initial configuration of Schoolplanner4Untis as simple as possible. Therefore, our configuration assistant helps you through the first steps. 

If you use SP4U the first time, please use the easy mode. The assistant will help you to create a Loginset in three easy steps. 

If you do not need any help, choose the expert mode. You will be able to insert all needed information in a single step.
